<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2174</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Grammar Worksheet on passive tenses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik-Bogen auf passiven Tempora</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau de grammaire sur des temps passifs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha da gramática em tempos passivos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro di grammatica sui tempi passivi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας γραμματικής στους παθητικούς χρόνους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hoja de trabajo de la gramática en tiempos 
pasivos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a work sheet for 10th grade students to Review- The Passive tenses -Past Perfect Tense & Past Perfect Continuous</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tenses</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">past perfect</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">passive</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Arbeit Blatt, damit 10. 
Gradkursteilnehmer die passiven Tempora - letztes vollkommenes Tempus 
u. letztes vollkommenes ununterbrochenes wiederholen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une feuille de travail pour que les 10èmes
étudiants de catégorie passent en revue les temps passifs - passé 
composé passé et continu parfait passé</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma folha do trabalho para que os 10ns 
estudantes da classe rev os tempos passivos - tempo perfeito passado &
contínuo perfeito passado</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un foglio del lavoro affinchè i decimi 
allievi del grado riveda i tempi passivi - passato prossimo passato & 
continuo perfetto passato</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα φύλλο εργασίας για τους 10ους 
σπουδαστές βαθμού που αναθεωρούν - οι παθητικοί χρόνοι - μετά 
από τον τέλειο χρόνο & τέλειο συνεχή παρελθόντος</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una hoja del trabajo para que los 10mos 
estudiantes del grado repasen los tiempos pasivos - del pretérito 
perfecto tenso del pretérito perfecto continuo y</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tempora</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">letztes vollkommenes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">passiv</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grammaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">temps</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">parfait passé</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">passif</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tempos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">perfeito passado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
